means: 基督教徒( Christian的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: They brought up their children to be God-fearing Christians.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们将孩子培养成了虔诚的基督教徒。

sentence.Network_en: They attended a revivalist meeting and became born-again Christians.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们参加了一个奋兴布道会，成为了获得重生的基督徒。

sentence.Network_en: Last week there were clashes during protests by Christians and Muslims.
sentence.Network_cn: 上周在基督徒和伊斯兰教徒举行的抗议活动中发生了冲突。

entry.def: A Christian is someone who follows the teachings of Jesus Christ.

example.ex: Last week there were clashes during protests by Christians and Muslims.
example.tran: 上周在基督徒和伊斯兰教徒举行的抗议活动中发生了冲突。

entry.def: Christian means relating to Christianity or Christians.
